block.p: COLLABOREX, Fairfax, Va., named Mike Meyer president and chief operating officer. He had been chief executive at Cap Gemini America.
INTERNET CAPITAL GROUP, Wayne, Pa., named Edward H. West chief financial officer, succeeding David D. Gathman, who is leaving. Mr. West had been chief financial officer at Delta Air Lines.
COLLABOREX, Fairfax, Va., named Mike Meyer president and chief operating officer. He had been chief executive at Cap Gemini America.
INTERNET CAPITAL GROUP, Wayne, Pa., named Edward H. West chief financial officer, succeeding David D. Gathman, who is leaving. Mr. West had been chief financial officer at Delta Air Lines.

WENDY'S INTERNATIONAL, Dublin, Ohio, named Kerrii B. Anderson executive vice president and chief financial officer, succeeding Frederick Reed, who resigned. Ms. Anderson was most recently chief financial officer at M/I Schottenstein Homes, where she remains a director.
